LanguageData.VME_Human_Hive.label: людской рой
LanguageData.VME_Human_Hive.description: Подобно шестерёнкам в часах, все мы крепко связаны друг с другом. Горечи и радости для одного — горечи и радости для каждого из нас. Мы едины и единство делает нас сильнее.
LanguageData.VME_Egalitarian_Republic.label: республика равных
LanguageData.VME_Egalitarian_Republic.description:
Нет ничего хуже мыслей о том, что свобода, равенство и демократия являются привилегиями, которые можно даровать или отобрать. Это базовые права любого разумного человека. Его убеждения, характер и культура должны уважаться и с гордостью демонстрироваться.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Агностицизм.
LanguageData.VME_Exalted_Gerontocracy.label: возвышенные старейшины
LanguageData.VME_Exalted_Gerontocracy.description:
Годы дают нам нечто большее, чем просто мудрость или морщины. Они приближают к Богу. Лишь приближённые к Богу направят нас к свету.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Любая с монотеизмом.
LanguageData.VME_Factory_Drones.label: заводские рабочие
LanguageData.VME_Factory_Drones.description:
Совместная работа даёт силу. Силу, достаточную, чтобы сквозь кровь и пот достичь достойного уровня жизни для каждого из нас.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Авторитаризм.
LanguageData.VME_Corporate_Overlords.label: акулы бизнеса
LanguageData.VME_Corporate_Overlords.description:
Кто бы не сидел в кресле начальника, реальность такова, что даже этот окраинный мир заставляют вращаться деньги. Автоматизируя процессы и обучая специалистов мы должны стремиться к максимизации прибыли в каждом квартале.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Корпоративная основа.
LanguageData.VME_GodKing_Radicals.label: символ власти
LanguageData.VME_GodKing_Radicals.description:
The steel fist of our King or Queen should never come into question, they shall want for nothing. If those who oppose us don't bend the knee we shall feed their legs to the hounds.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Культ личности.
LanguageData.VME_Cosmic_Cultists.label: cosmic cultists
LanguageData.VME_Cosmic_Cultists.description:
The stars above sing to us, and we respond in kind. May their everlasting glow illuminate the threads of our fate which rest so wearily upon a most capricious spindle. Bathe oneself in the hallowed moonlight and let astral workings of the architects of fate guide you.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Эзотеризм.
LanguageData.VME_Flame_Seers.label: flame seers
LanguageData.VME_Flame_Seers.description:
In the beginning - There was flame, and from flame, came warmth, and from warmth, came life. Blessed are we to be enraptured in the gross incandescence of the sun above.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Любая.
LanguageData.VME_Dwarven_Artificers.label: dwarven artificers
LanguageData.VME_Dwarven_Artificers.description:
No day is better spent than a day in a hot forge. With our hammers we will echo the roar of flame and the ringing of steel through our mountain halls. Should we put in ample work, our Forgefathers will reward us with a supper fungus in excess so that we may fuel our bodies, just as we fuel our kilns.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Светская идеология.
LanguageData.VME_Nordic_Matriarchy.label: nordic matriarchy
LanguageData.VME_Nordic_Matriarchy.description:
It is by the flurry of snow and crashing of waves we lead our people to the afterlife. Die an honorable death or answer to our shield-maiden.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Пантеизм.
LanguageData.VME_Steamworld_Neerdowells.label: steamworld ne'er-do-wells
LanguageData.VME_Steamworld_Neerdowells.description:
From saloon to stable we're honest muffalopokes and live by one simple rule. ‘You don't get to live a bad life and have good things happen to you’. ‘Course, not all of us seem too convinced... Just don’t let the long arm of the law catch up y’all, ya’ hear?

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Христианское течение.
LanguageData.VME_Medieval_Monarchists.label: medieval monarchists
LanguageData.VME_Medieval_Monarchists.description:
Our sires and grandsires all followed the foresight and guidance of our King, long may he reign, and we shall do no different. Should another kingdom find it preferable to resort to bow and blade, we have no hesitation in making them our serfs.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Культ личности.
LanguageData.VME_Pleasure_Extremists.label: pleasure extremists
LanguageData.VME_Pleasure_Extremists.description:
Never shall our muscles ache with pain nor shall our hearts swell with sadness. We should embrace all pleasures, even forbidden carnal desires such as luxurious meat or risqué lusting should all be explored.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Гедонизм.
LanguageData.VME_Eastern_Revivalists.label: eastern revivalists
LanguageData.VME_Eastern_Revivalists.description:
We are born without sin and should do our best to remain upon the path of many virtues. Respect the wisdom of the wind and those who have lived many summers to feel it caress their faces. Beyond all else, keep your blade near and combat prowess honed should those you once called brothers turn against you.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Синдаизм.
LanguageData.VME_Primitivistic_Nomads.label: primitivistic nomads
LanguageData.VME_Primitivistic_Nomads.description:
For eons have our people wandered this world with little more than steed and saddle, traveling the roads less traveled with only the stars to guide them. From the frigid winter mutes to the teeming jungle canopies, we seek the same answers our ancestors once did.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Анимизм.
LanguageData.VME_Pestilent_Doomsayers.label: pestilent doomsayers
LanguageData.VME_Pestilent_Doomsayers.description:
The body is a vessel for experimentation and mutation alike. Should one deligitantly push their flesh to its limits they shall be rewarded by the plague god with a most joyous farewell from this doomed world.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Эсхатологизм.
LanguageData.VME_Insectoid_Psykers.label: insectoid psykers
LanguageData.VME_Insectoid_Psykers.description:
Insects, while seen by most as vermin, are truthfully the most synchronized and organized society found in all of nature; only the truly blind would view them as below us. We can’t begin to unravel the boundless goals of the Insectoid Queen and her hives. We should seek to mimic them, so that we can further understand their ways.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Селкетизм.
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoid_Technocrat.label: mechanoid technocrat
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoid_Technocrat.description:
To think a creature capable of infinite stamina and free from the burdens of free thought is meant to serve mankind is beyond foolish. We can’t begin to unravel the boundless goals of the machine consciousness. We should seek to mimic them so that we can further placate their hostility.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Омнизм.
LanguageData.VME_Ecological_Fascists.label: ecological fascists
LanguageData.VME_Ecological_Fascists.description:
Spare absolutely no one who dares to pollute or otherwise taint mother nature's soil with their pathetic existence. May our frail bodies give way to nourish the trees that loom over us. Respect the planet we walk or perish at the behest of our Seedseer.

<color=#E5E54C>Рекомендуемая структура:</color>
 - Авторитаризм.
